Package io.crums.sldg.db

Class Finder

java.lang.Object
io.crums.sldg.db.Finder
public class Finder
extends java.lang.Object
Finds entries in a ledger.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static int DEFAULT_LIMIT  
    static java.util.Comparator<Row> ENTRY_NUMBER_COMP
    Compares 2 rows firstly by their input hashes, and secondly by their row numbers as tie-breakers.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Finder​(Ledger ledger)
    Creates an instance with a ledger.

    java.util.List<Row> byEntryPrefix​(java.nio.ByteBuffer entryHashPrefix, long startRowNumber, long endRowNumber, int limit)
    Returns an ordered list of rows with matching entry hashes.
    Ledger getLedger()

      public java.util.List<Row> byEntryPrefix​(java.nio.ByteBuffer entryHashPrefix)
      Returns an ordered list of rows with matching entry hashes starting frow row 1.
      Parameters:
      entryHashPrefix - has remaining bytes but no more than 32
      Returns:
      non-null (but possibly empty) list of rows in ENTRY_NUMBER_COMP order.

      Returns an ordered list of rows with matching entry hashes.
      Parameters:
      entryHashPrefix - has remaining bytes but no more than 32
      startRowNumber - inclusive
      Returns:
      non-null (but possibly empty) list of rows in ENTRY_NUMBER_COMP order.

    • byEntryPrefix

      public java.util.List<Row> byEntryPrefix​(java.nio.ByteBuffer entryHashPrefix, long startRowNumber, int limit)
      Returns an ordered list of rows with matching entry hashes.
      Parameters:
      entryHashPrefix - has remaining bytes but no more than 32
      startRowNumber - inclusive
      limit - the maximum size of the returned list (≥ 1)
      Returns:
      non-null (but possibly empty) list of rows in ENTRY_NUMBER_COMP order.

    • byEntryPrefix

      public java.util.List<Row> byEntryPrefix​(java.nio.ByteBuffer entryHashPrefix, long startRowNumber, long endRowNumber, int limit)
      Returns an ordered list of rows with matching entry hashes.
      Parameters:
      entryHashPrefix - has remaining bytes but no more than 32
      startRowNumber - inclusive
      endRowNumber - exclusive
      limit - the maximum size of the returned list (≥ 1)
      Returns:
      non-null (but possibly empty) list of rows in ENTRY_NUMBER_COMP order.
